headline: A Needle in a Haystack? How About an AirPod in a Subway Grate?
abstract: Over 7,000 electronics items were found throughout the subway system last year. Earbuds are the most common thing lost.
lead_paragraph: Recently, after having dinner in Midtown Manhattan, I put on my AirPods Pro as I walked to the subway station. I began getting hot, so I gently pulled off my red beanie while at 58th Street and Broadway. Then it happened.
